title.rendered: How to Nail Your First Week on Handshake

content.rendered:
You have probably heard a lot about how Handshake can help you connect with employers, find internships, and discover your path to a fulfilling career. But where does one begin? After you sign up for Handshake, there are a handful of specific actions you can take to set yourself up for success. Watch the video below to learn our team’s top tips for making the most of your first week on Handshake, including:

  1. Fill out your profile
  2. View and save jobs
  3. Follow employers you like
  4. Register for a virtual event
  5. Apply to your first job or internship

Be sure to follow us on Instagram for even more useful tips for your job hunt!

excerpt.rendered: Do these five things in your first week on Handshake to set yourself up for success!
